content: For release on delivery  3:30 p.m. EST   November 8, 2013      The Crisis as a Classic Financial Panic    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Fourteenth Jacques Polak Annual Research Conference     Sponsored by the International Monetary Fund     Washington, D.C.                 November 8, 2013
